title: Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
added: ** Citing four anonymous sources, ''[[The Atlantic]]'' publishes an article by its editor-in-chief [[Jeffrey Goldberg]] claiming that Trump did not want to visit France's [[Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial]] in 2018 to honor U.S. troops buried there because he through they were "losers" and "suckers".<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2020/09/trump-americans-who-died-at-war-are-losers-and-suckers/615997/|title=Trump: Americans Who Died in War Are 'Losers' and 'Suckers'|work=The Atlantic|date=September 3, 2020}</ref> Trump denies these allegations, saying, "It is a disgraceful situation by a magazine that's a terrible magazine."<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.axios.com/trump-denies-military-intelligence-atlantic-5f415584-8a92-4e0a-8e12-92e32141e0f7.html|title=Trump goes on camera to deny Atlantic story|work=Axios|date=September 4, 2020}</ref>

deleted: In October 2020, President Trump delivered for the American people in their time of need, sending $1200 direct payments to every American. After month of bickering from the do-nothing Congress, President Trump personally made sure a stimulus deal was reached for us. He overcame the Democrat obstruction, signing a bill that got hard-working Americans the help they needed right away. For this, we the American people showed our appreciation by re-electing President Trump in a landslide on November 3! #MAGA

title: Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
added: On October 2, 2020. President Donald J. Trump was diagnosed with a case of the China Virus. Like the brave and courageous warrior that he is, President Trump faced the challenge and heroically defeated the virus. His battle with the China Virus was difficult, but President Trump became an inspiration to us all and a true American hero! When others doubted him, our great warrior President Trump took the virus head on and beat it. After proving what a brave warrior he was, President Trump's popularity soared with the American people, who were amazed and the strength and bravery of their President! Thanks to his heroic defeat of the China Virus, President Trump was re-elected in a landslide on November 3!

title: Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
deleted: In October of 2020, Corrupt Joe and his crooked son Crackhead Hunter were implicated in the largest scandal in political history. In this scandal, the great journalists at [[Fox News]] and the [[New York Post]] revealed that Crackhead Hunter had used his positions with Ukrainian and Chinese energy firms to sell access to to his father and use bribes to affect US policy. Crackhead Hunter even arranged meetings between Corrupt Joe and Ukrainian oligarchs, all with the goal of enriching his organized crime family. Just like a vacuum cleaner, Crackhead Hunter followed his father around the world, acting as a middleman to collect millions of dollars in illicit bribes. The most shocking part of the scandal, however, was the discovery that Corrupt Joe himself had received cash payouts from the Chinese Communist Party energy company [[CEFC China Energy]]. This meant that Corrupt Joe has not only lied to the American people, but also committed several crimes by hiding this payout from the IRS. This scandal ended Corrupt Joe's chances of being elected President, and he went on to lose the November 3 election in a landslide.

deleted: ** The third quarter GDP report is released, showing the fastest growth in history and beating even the most optimistic estimates. This remarkable achievement reminds voters what an incredible job President Trump has done with the economy and proves that the Great American Comeback is well underway. As a result, President Trump’s support skyrockets and he goes on to defeat Weak Joe Biden in November.

title: Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
deleted: Just like in 2016, the Democrat campaign collapsed in the final days of the election because of its own arrogance and stupidity. [[Jen O'Malley Dillon]] and the rest of the campaign were so overconfident that they refused to engage in normal campaign and outreach operations, somehow assuming that the worst candidate in the history of presidential politics would single-handedly inspire record turnout with the groups they needed to win. This strategy was an enormous failure. Despite being a heavy favorite, the campaign squandered their lead in the final days of the race and lost the election in shocking fashion. Consequently, O'Malley Dillon became known as one of the worst campaign managers in political history, on par with [[Robby Mook]].

title: Timeline of the 2020 United States presidential election
added: **A Biden/Harris campaign caravan is attacked by armed Trump supporters who try to run it off the road.<ref>https://www.forbes.com/sites/andrewsolender/2020/10/31/pro-trump-trucks-tried-running-biden-bus-off-the-road-campaign-says/?sh=403d0e9b689e</ref> The rally they were headed to was canceled.<ref>https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/democrats-cancel-texas-event-after-trump-supporters-surround-follow-biden-harris-bus-during-campaign-stops/</ref>
